# 50-microservice.txt - AUTOGENERATED, DO NOT MODIFY MANUALLY

# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O common-tosca-catalog-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/catalog/catalog-all/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/catalog-all-1.1.0-20161216.004206-40-linux64.tar.gz" && tar -xf common-tosca-catalog-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz && rm -f common-tosca-catalog-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT-linux64.tar.gz
EXPOSE 8200
RUN echo Open-O common-tosca-catalog 1.1.0-SNAPSHOT "https://nexus.open-o.org/service/local/repositories/snapshots/content/org/openo/common-tosca/catalog/catalog-all/1.1.0-SNAPSHOT/catalog-all-1.1.0-20161216.004206-40-linux64.tar.gz" > OPENO_VERSION
